Name: Destruction Time!
About the game: It's destruction time! Build, blow up, and destroy! In this world of realistic physics, you can smash castles with catapults, blow up buildings, shoot slingshots and throw objects, and watch buildings fall apart beautifully. This is a true destruction simulator. Create your own building from scratch, or choose from one of the available options. Decide in which mode you want to demolish it - by completing tasks or creating chaos with various tools in the sandbox and get down to the fun, or take your time and tear down piece by piece. Simulate physics using the latest Unreal Engine Chaos technology. Beautifully realistic destruction. Sandbox with a variety of destructive tools.
